akas from release info: Tim Gunn: Guru de Estilo Brazil
Tim Gunn's Guide to Style Greece
Tim Gunn's Guide to Style USA (complete title)

1.title: Meredith
1.plot: Years of working in D.C.'s political world has left Meredith's closet filled with ultra conservative androgynous suits, huge sweaters, jeans and clogs. Now that she's moved to New York, Meredith has decided it's time to find her own style.

2.title: Angela
2.plot: A closet full of frilly ball gowns and baby doll dresses will not serve Angela well as she launches her new career as the CEO of a luxury spa company. Sadly, Angela's insecurities about her body have adversely affected her fashion choices.

3.title: Ali
3.plot: Formerly a single party girl, Ali is now an Upper East Side wife and mother of twins, and her fashion choices -- combined with her desire to be a size 0 -- are at odds with her post-natal figure and her new status in life.

4.title: Caroline
4.plot: Twenty five-year-old real estate agent Caroline believes the key to her professional success is dressing like she's 40 -- a frumpy 40. Caroline thinks Tim and Gretta only need to help her with her after-hours wardrobe, but they suspect that her workplace style may be holding back her career.

5.title: Diana
5.plot: Diana, the director of a not-for-profit charity, has a wardrobe ruled by sale price as opposed to a distinct style. As a result, her closet is full to bursting. Tim and Gretta help her pare down and learn the lesson of "less is more."

6.title: Eliza
6.plot: Eliza is a 34-year-old singer/songwriter who dresses like a rocker both on stage and off. Her style neither compliments her music nor her conservative family, so Tim must intervene in time for her band's highly anticipated New York performance. Fashion help from: hairstylist Sally Hershberger and fashion designer Kay Unger.

7.title: Ariana
7.plot: Ariana just got the promotion of a lifetime and has accepted the position as head of marketing at her sister's start-up company. In order to make the right impression, she will have to get rid of her old, worn-out clothing and take Tim's advice that some clothes are worth investing in. Fashion help from: Fashion designer Angel Sanchez and makeup artist Gordon Espinet of MAC Cosmetics.

8.title: Erica
8.plot: At 5'11, Erica claims it's hard to find clothes that fit her properly, consequently leaving her looking like she has outgrown her outfits. Big changes in Erica's life involve her launching a Veterinary hospital and marrying her fianc? of 4 years; so it is only fitting for her awkward look to be transformed as well. Fashion help from Tim and Gretta, aided by guest star Tyson Beckford, help Erica with her shopping and size issue, leading her to discover a whole new side to herself.

1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Tim Gunn uses his unmatched counseling skills to turn the fashion weary Rebecca into a polished individual. Tired of feeling like the "little sister" or "one of the guys," Rebecca must confront her fear of dressing like a grown-up in real clothes.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: In the first episode of Tim Gunn's Guide to Style, Tim Gunn uses his unmatched counseling skills to turn the fashion weary Rebecca into a polished individual. Tired of feeling like the "little sister" or "one of the guys," Rebecca must confront her fear of dressing like a grown-up in real clothes. "Fashion Accomplice" Veronica Webb guides her through shopping the "Tim Gunn way," steering her choices in the right direction and listening to her concerns and offering solutions. Watch as Gunn and Webb give Rebecca the tools and guidance to become the fashionably confident...

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Finding the right fit is the challenge in the third episode of Tim Gunn's Guide to Style. After an extreme weight loss, JeAnne has no clue how to dress or shop for herself. Gunn and fashion accomplice Veronica Webb are sent to the rescue to help her become the fashion diva she has always wanted to be. While building her signature look, JeAnne uses Gunn's "essential shopping list," which includes 10 basic pieces that no closet should be without, to create her new look. While this seems like an easy task, JeAnne has never been taught how to shop and struggles with being...

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: A one time "prom queen" has lost her fashion sense and needs Tim Gunn and Veronica Webb's help to find it and keep the "mom jeans" away. In this touching episode of Tim Gunn's Guide To Style, viewers follow Nicole, a new wife and mom getting used to her post baby body, who longs to find her inner fashionista in time for her 30th birthday. With Gunn's guidance and tools, Nicole has what it takes to go from "blah in beige" to a hot momma who owns her new look.

5.title: Lori Jones
5.plot: Once known by friends as a "Barbie girl," Lori has lost her confidence after suffering a major injury that has resulted in scarring. Tim Gunn and style accomplice Veronica Webb work to help rebuild her confidence and rediscover the woman, who was once known for dressing up and sporting edgy designers.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Once known by friends as a "Barbie girl," Lori has lost her confidence after suffering a major injury that has resulted in scarring. Tim Gunn and style accomplice Veronica Webb work to help rebuild her confidence and rediscover the woman, who was once known for dressing up and sporting edgy designers. It's an emotional journey for Lori, who now has a closet full of sweatpants that hide her injuries. With her wedding day approaching, Lori desperately wants to find a fun, sexy new look that will help her walk with her head held high. Gunn and Webb aim to prove that she ...

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Finding the right fit is the challenge in the third episode of Tim Gunn's Guide To Style. After an extreme weight loss, JeAnne has no clue how to dress or shop for herself.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: In this touching episode of Tim Gunn's Guide to Style, viewers meet Elena, a new mother struggling to let go of her college look and get used to her post-baby body. Gunn and Webb show Elena how to put a sophisticated twist on her fun and youthful spirit. With their help, Elena is able to leave her bows and flowers behind for a new fabulous age-appropriate look.

imdb.title: Guide to Style
plot: Project Runway star Tim Gunn gives fashion makeovers to the style-challenged.::Anonymous
